body:
After some digging around in the code base, the issue is that the `os.Args` isn't initialized for `android/arm64` when building with `buildmode=c-shared`.

[`android/arm64`](https://github.com/golang/go/blob/master/src/runtime/rt0_android_arm64.s) vs. [`android/arm`](https://github.com/golang/go/blob/master/src/runtime/rt0_android_arm.s)
